Translations.Text: Yoru otozureru mono ga nandearu ka o, anata ni rikai sa seru mono wa nani ka
Dare mo jibun no ue ni gadian (tenshi) o motanai mono wanai
Ningen wa, nani kara tsukura reta ka o kosatsu sa se nasai
Kare wa funshutsu suru mizu kara tsukura re
(soreha) rokkotsu to koshi no ma kara detekuru
Hontoni kare wa, kare o (aratana seimei ni) hikimodosu koto ga kanodearu
Kakusa reta koto ga bakuro sa reru hi
(ningen ni wa) chikara mo naku, dare no tasuke mo nai
Hontoni kore wa,(zen'aku o) shikibetsu suru okotoba
Hontoni kare-ra wa, inbo o takurande iru
Ware mo mata sakubo o megurasu
Dakara fushin-sha-tachi o yuyo shi, shibaraku honin suruga i
